game.name: Ball Torture
game.shortDescription: 공 고문은 재활용 구획에서 탈출하려고 공을 제어하는 흥미 진진한 2 차원 퍼즐 게임이다. 위험한 장애물을 극복 도전을 해결하고 기술을 증명하기 위해 별을 수집합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ball Torture is an exciting 2D puzzle game where you control a bowling ball, trying to escape from the recycling compartment. Overcome sharp saws and other obstacles, reach 30 checkpoints, and collect stars to become the winner among the balls in the recycling compartment!

reviewHighlights.text: I hated every second I played this game. Got all 100% on achievements though.
